summary: Comprehensive testing of enhanced multiplayer Tic-Tac-Toe with new game codes, player search, and animation features. Backend APIs (21/22) working correctly with all new endpoints functional. Frontend features mostly working with excellent animations and UI design, but one critical gameplay issue found.

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Other game creation methods work fine

ui_bugs.issue: Game cells not clickable due to gradient overlay blocking interaction

integration_issues.issue: Failed to load player games API call in search dialog

passed_tests: Homepage with animated background grid and floating particles
Username entry and player creation functionality
Game mode buttons (Local 2-Player, Online Multiplayer, Join with Code)
Join by Code dialog opens with proper 6-character input field
Join by Code validation and error handling
Search Players dialog with debounced search functionality
Player search API returning results correctly
Online Lobby with Create New Game gradient button
Game code generation (6-character alphanumeric codes like 'UPT66J')
Game code display in header during online games
Game code copying functionality with success indication
WebSocket connectivity showing 'Connected' status
Animated game board with gradient border glow
Player names with neon glow effects (X and O)
Turn indicator animations and styling
Stats page with animated cards showing player statistics
History page with match history display
Navigation between all pages working correctly
Responsive design and modern UI with framer-motion animations
Backend API endpoints for game codes: GET /api/games/by-code/{code}
Backend API endpoints for joining by code: POST /api/games/join-by-code
Backend API endpoints for player search: GET /api/players/search/{query}
Backend API endpoints for player games: GET /api/players/{username}/games

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (animations and UI excellent, but gameplay blocked)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix game cell clickability issue - gradient overlay is blocking interaction with game cells, preventing gameplay. Also fix /api/games/waiting endpoint returning 520 error and player games loading in search dialog.
